trans-unit.source: Represents the method that executes on a <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerer metoden som kjører på en <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When a managed thread is created, the method that executes on the thread is represented by: - A <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart> delegate that is passed to the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.%23ctor%28System.Threading.ThreadStart%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Når en administrert tråd opprettes, metoden som kjører på tråd representeres av: – en <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart>representanten som er sendt til den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.%23ctor%28System.Threading.ThreadStart%29?displayProperty=fullName>konstruktør.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.%23ctor%28System.Threading.ThreadStart%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart>

trans-unit.source: Any method that has no parameters and that returns `void` in C# or is a `Sub` procedure in Visual Basic can represent the delegate.
trans-unit.target: En metode som har ingen parametere, og som returnerer `void` i C# eller en `Sub` prosedyren i Visual Basic kan representere representanten.

trans-unit.source: - A ParameterizedThreadStart delegate that is passed to the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.%23ctor%28System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor.
trans-unit.target: -ParameterizedThreadStart representant som er sendt til den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.%23ctor%28System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=fullName>konstruktør.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.%23ctor%28System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Any method that has a single parameter of type <xref:System.Object> and that returns void in C# or is a Sub procedure in Visual Basic can represent the delegate.
trans-unit.target: En metode som har en parameter av typen <xref:System.Object>og som returnerer void i C# eller Sub-prosedyre i Visual Basic kan representere representanten.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The thread does not begin executing until the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Tråden begynner ikke kjøres før den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-metoden.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart> or ParameterizedThreadStart delegate is invoked on the thread, and execution begins at the first line of the method represented by the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart>ParameterizedThreadStart representanten aktiveres på tråd eller kjøring starter på den første linjen for metoden representert av representanten.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart>

trans-unit.source: In the case of the ParameterizedThreadStart delegate, the object that is passed to the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%28System.Object%29> method is passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Når det gjelder ParameterizedThreadStart representant objektet som er sendt til den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%28System.Object%29>metoden er sendt til representanten.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%28System.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic and C# users can omit the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart> or ParameterizedThreadStart delegate constructor when creating a thread.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic og C# brukere kan utelate den <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart>eller ParameterizedThreadStart representantkonstruktør når du oppretter en tråd.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart>

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, use the `AddressOf` operator when passing your method to the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.%23ctor%2A> constructor; for example, `Dim t As New Thread(AddressOf ThreadProc)`.
trans-unit.target: I Visual Basic, kan du bruke den `AddressOf` operatoren ved sending av metoden til den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.%23ctor%2A>konstruktøren, for eksempel `Dim t As New Thread(AddressOf ThreadProc)`.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: In C#, simply specify the name of the thread procedure.
trans-unit.target: I C# ganske enkelt du angi navnet på tråd.

trans-unit.source: The compiler selects the correct delegate constructor.
trans-unit.target: Kompilatoren velger riktig representanten-konstruktøren.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you create a ParameterizedThreadStart delegate for an instance method in C++, the first parameter of the constructor is the instance variable.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når du oppretter ParameterizedThreadStart representant for en forekomst-metoden i C++, er den første parameteren for konstruktøren variabelen forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: For a static method, the first parameter of the constructor is zero.
trans-unit.target: For en statisk metode er den første parameteren for konstruktøren null.

trans-unit.source: For a static method, the delegate constructor requires only one parameter: the address of the callback method, qualified by the class name.
trans-unit.target: For en statisk metode krever representanten konstruktøren bare én parameter: adressen til metoden tilbakeringing kvalifisert av klassen.

trans-unit.source: The ParameterizedThreadStart delegate and the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> method overload make it easy to pass data to a thread procedure, but this technique is not type safe because any object can be passed to <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Representanten ParameterizedThreadStart og <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>metoden overbelastning gjør det enkelt å sende data til en tråd prosedyre, men denne metoden er ikke typen trygt fordi et objekt kan sendes til <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A more robust way to pass data to a thread procedure is to put both the thread procedure and the data fields into a worker object.
trans-unit.target: En mer robust måte å sende data til en tråd prosedyre er å plassere både tråd prosedyren og datafeltene til et objekt for arbeidsprosessen.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Creating Threads and Passing Data at Start Time](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [oppretter tråder og sende Data på starttid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The ParameterizedThreadStart delegate supports only a single parameter.
trans-unit.target: Representanten ParameterizedThreadStart støtter bare én enkelt parameter.

trans-unit.source: You can pass multiple data items to the ParameterizedThreadStart by making that parameter one of the following: - An array.
trans-unit.target: Du kan sende flere dataelementer til ParameterizedThreadStart ved å gjøre at parameteren én av følgende: – en matrise.

trans-unit.source: - A collection type, if all of the data items are of the same type.
trans-unit.target: – En samlingstype hvis alle dataelementene er av samme type.

trans-unit.source: - A tuple type, such as <xref:System.Tuple%602> or <xref:System.Tuple%604>.
trans-unit.target: – En tuppel-type, for eksempel <xref:System.Tuple%602>eller <xref:System.Tuple%604>.</xref:System.Tuple%604> </xref:System.Tuple%602>
